name: Patience, my Patients
description:
An accident occurs in a hospital... Amidst the chaos, a doctor comes upon a group of patients while trying to find his way out through various hazards.

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD - Move

Z / E - Interact

X / Shift - Switch Characters

Space - Jump

Credits

Lukas Paiva

Maurício Ramalho

Roberland Ricardo

Vitória Deon

Wesley Ronald

This demo was originally made in 48h for epojam 2019 and is still in development.

If you want to see other games created for that jam, click here.
